T07n797u_001:1260: na kharaṃ nahi vāstabdhaṃ munīndra vacana tava |
T07n797u_001:1267: puttā me pādasaṃbhattā sajjā santeva tādise || 289 ||
T07n797u_001:1269: putrāḥ me pādasaṃbhaktāḥ sajjāḥ santyeva tāddaśe ||
T07n797u_001:1275: rājate raṃsimāli' yaṃ bhagavā bodhayaṃ jane || 291 ||
T07n797u_001:1277: rājate raśmimālī ayaṃ bhagavān bodhayan janān ||
T07n797u_001:1283: sugato visadaṃ pātu pāṇina so vināyako || 293 ||
T07n797u_001:1285: sugato viṣadaṃ pātu prāṇina so vināyakaḥ ||
T07n797u_001:1299: suṇānti vācaṃ munino janā passanti cāmatam || 297 ||
T07n797u_001:1301: śraṇvanti vacanaṃ muneḥ janāḥ paśyanti cāmṛtam ||
T07n797u_001:1303: manopiṇoti jantūnaṃ jino vācāya bhāya ca || 298 ||
T07n797u_001:1305: manaḥ prīṇāti jantūnāṃ jino vācā tathā bhāsā ||
T07n797u_001:1308: keśākṣṇāmeva kṛṣṇatvaṃ bhru ṇāmeva ca vakratā |
T07n797u_001:1328: saṃkittanaṃ bhavati yaṃ sām matā tulyogitā || 304 ||
T07n797u_001:1329: guṇayuktaihi vastubhiḥ samaṃ kṛtvā tu kasyacit |
T07n797u_001:1330: saṃkīrtta naṃ bhavati yat sā matā tulyayogitā ||
T07n797u_001:1332: ubho hi raṃsimālī ca bhagavā ca tamonudo || 305 ||
T07n797u_001:1334: ubhau hi raśmimālī ca bhagavāṃśca tamonudaḥ ||
T07n797u_001:1335: atthantaraṃ sādhayatā kici taṃ sadisaṃ phalaṃ |
T07n797u_001:1336: dassiyate asantaṃ vā santaṃ vā taṃ nidassanaṃ || 306 ||
T07n797u_001:1338: darśayate sadasadvāpi proktā sā tu nirdaśanā ||
T07n797u_001:1349: vibhūtyā mahadarthantu aghīptyāṃ yasya vā syāt |
T07n797u_001:1359: gopetvā vaṇṇaniyamaṃ yaṃ kiñci dassiyate paraṃ |
T07n797u_001:1360: asamaṃ vā samaṃ tassa yadi sā vañcanā matā || 312 ||
T07n797u_001:1362: asamaṃ vā samaṃ tasya yadi sā vañcanā matā ||
T07n797u_001:1363: purato na sahassesu na pañcesu ca tādino |
T07n797u_001:1365: purato na sahastreṣuḥ na pñceṣuśca tāddaśaḥ |
T07n797u_001:1379: uttaraṃ uttaraṃ yattha pubba pubba visesanaṃ |
T07n797u_001:1387: asantuṭaṭho yatineva santoso na nālayā hato |
T07n797u_001:1396: mahanti vindate kanti so'pi teneva tādisi || 321 ||
T07n797u_001:1398: mahatīṃ vindate kānti so'pi tenava tāddaśīm ||
T07n797u_001:1399: kathanaṃ sahabhāvassa kriyāya ca guṇassa ca |
T07n797u_001:1404: vijumbhati ca candena samaṃ tammukha candimā || 322 ||
T07n797u_001:1406: vijumbhate ca candreṇa samaṃ te mukha candramāḥ ||
T07n797u_001:1408: pāpaṃ, disā suvimalā saha sajjana cetasā || 324 ||
T07n797u_001:1415: guṇā sabhāva madhurā api lokeka bandhuno |
T07n797u_001:1419: yassa kassaci dānena yassa kassaci vatthuno |
T07n797u_001:1421: yasya kasyāpi dānena yasya kasyāpi vastunaḥ |
T07n797u_001:1423: purā paresaṃ datvā na manuñña nayanādikaṃ |
T07n797u_001:1425: purā parebhyo datvā nu manojñaṃ nayanādikam |
T07n797u_001:1428: saṃsayāpagataṃ vatthu yattha soyaṃ bhamo mato || 329 ||
T07n797u_001:1430: saṃśayāpagataṃ vastu yatra so'yaṃ bhramo mataḥ ||
T07n797u_001:1436: yena kenaci vaṇṇena bhāvo nāmāya mīrito || 331 ||
T07n797u_001:1439: nanu te yeva santāno sāgarā na kulā calā |
T07n797u_001:1440: manampi mariyādaṃ ye saṃvuṭṭhepi jahanti no ||
T07n797u_001:1441: na nu te eva santānaḥ sāgarā nakulā calāḥ |
T07n797u_001:1442: manasāpi ca maryyādāṃ ye saṃvṛṣṭe'i jahanti no ||
T07n797u_001:1446: aho gāḍhaṃ nimugge'i sukhayatyeva te jane || 334 ||
T07n797u_001:1451: madhū'va munino vācā na sampīṇotikaṃ janaṃ || 335 ||
T07n797u_001:1453: yathāmadhu munevaco na samprīṇanti kaṃ janam ||
T07n797u_001:1459: rasavantaṃ ti taṃ ñeyyaṃ rasavanta vidhāna to || 337 ||
T07n797u_001:1473: ko nāma passitumalaṃ khalu tā samantaṃ || 339 ||
T07n797u_001:1494: cittavutti visesā tu bhāvayanti rasā yato |
T07n797u_001:1502: rati hāso ca soko ca kodhussāhabhayaṃ i ca |
T07n797u_001:1507: ye te caranti sīlena te honti vyabhicāriṇo || 345 ||
T07n797u_001:1509: ye te caranti śīlena bhavanti vyabhicāriṇaḥ ||
T07n797u_001:1522: thambha palaya romāñca tathā sedassu vepathu |
T07n797u_001:1525: vaivarṇya virvaratā bhāvā aṣṭaite hi sāttvikāḥ ||
T07n797u_001:1526: yadā ratyādayo bhāvā dhiti sīlā na honti ce |
T07n797u_001:1527: tadā savvepi te bhāvā bhavanti vyabhicāriṇo || 349 ||
T07n797u_001:1528: yadā ratyādayo bhāvā dhṛtiśīlā na bhavanti cet |
T07n797u_001:1529: tadā sarve'i te bhāvā bhavanti vyabhicāriṇāḥ ||
T07n797u_001:1531: yo siyā bodhakaṃ tesaṃ anubhāvo' yamīrito || 350 ||
T07n797u_001:1534: neka hetu manovutti visesaṃ ca vibhāvitu |
T07n797u_001:1538: sabibhāvānubhāvehi bhāvā te te yathā' rahaṃ |
T07n797u_001:1540: sa vibhāvānubhāvai hi mhāvaste te yathārham |
T07n797u_001:1566: yutyā bhāvānubhāvā te nibandhā posayanti naṃ |
T07n797u_001:1572: pamipose miyā hasmo bhiyyo tthippabhutīna mo || 360 ||
T07n797u_001:1576: paripoṣe syāddhāsyaḥ bhūyaḥ strī prabhṛtīnāṃ saḥ ||
T07n797u_001:1580: dve dve hassā kathitā cesaṃ jeṭṭhe majjhe jamme' i ca kamato ||
T07n797u_001:1586: dve dve hāsyāḥkathitāścaiṣāṃ jyeṣṭhe madhye kaniṣṭhe ca kramataḥ |
T07n797u_001:1620: bhāvādihi tudukkaso santo santa nise vito || 371 ||
